mapper.insert: insert into View_SelectMachine (machine_id, employee_name, first_grade, second_grade, third_grade, machine_state, run_time, idle_time, error_time, record_time) values (#{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{firstGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{machineState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{runTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idleTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errorTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select * from View_SelectMachine order by machine_id
